document_data.name: Champions of Muktar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Champions of Muktar''' were an evil adventuring company in [[Muktar]] in [[Turmish]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Organization: They acted as high-ranking officers in the army of the self-styled king of [[Muktar]], [[Yrkhetep|Hetep]], during the war between Muktar and [[Golconda]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]] the Champions arranged a trap inside [[Fort Blood]] planned by the king of Muktar to eliminate an adventuring party well known in [[Golconda]]. Later they led Muktar's troops in the [[Battle of Wilma Pass]].
